artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige II; Publisher: Fujiokaya Keijirō; Carver: Koizumi Kanegorō
description: high view over rooftops of smaller buildings at center with figures on road; taller red buildings with blue roofs at left and right; figures on a balcony walkway at right; grey birds in sky, center and left; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Views of Famous Places in Edo (Edo meishō zue 江戸名勝圖會)
title: Sensō-ji Temple
